name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Keep track of all your habits.Unlock personal growth with the Notion Habit Tracker, an interactive tool designed to facilitate your journey. This tracker offers daily, weekly, and monthly views of your habits, providing an in-depth perspective on your routine. Monitor and achieve your goals with ease, while the calendar view gives a broader perspective on your progress.What's Inside?Daily Tracker: Monitor your everyday habits with the daily tracker. Mark off each day you successfully engage in a
features: Daily Tracker:Monitor your everyday habits with the daily tracker. Mark off each day you successfully engage in a habit, keeping a close eye on your consistency.; Monthly Tracker:The monthly tracker provides an even wider view, offering a snapshot of your long-term progress and habit maintenance.; Can I use the Notion Habit Tracker on all my devices?Yes, as long as you have the Notion app installed, you can use the tracker on any device where you access your Notion account.; Can I share the Notion Habit Tracker with others?Yes, you can share the tracker with others just like any other Notion document. However, others would need their own Notion account to use it.
